void Md2QmEngine::Initialize ( const string &  xmlfile  ) 

Reads in mapping .xml file to generate molecule, segment, fragment and atom templates ('types') that contain all necessary information to start mapping, except coordinates.

Parameters:
xmlfile 

Definition at line 32 of file Md2QmEngine.cc.

void Md2QmEngine::Md2Qm ( CSG::Topology *  mdtop,
CTP::Topology *  qmtop 
)

Using the templates for molecules, segments, ... generated in Initialize, Md2Qm maps the MD topology to the initially empty MD/QM Topology. Calls MoleculeFactory and ExportMolecule.

Parameters:
mdtop 
qmtop
